entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
